extraDescription: Informatics Professional Services (Application/Software Architects, Enterprise Architects, Technical Architects, Programmer Analysts, Database Modellers), on an a??as and when requesteda?? basis, to assist with the planning, designing, building, testing, implementing, configuring, developing, supporting, enhancing and maintaining of current and future infrastructure based products and technologies to provide efficient and effective delivery of IM/IT products or services to TBS clients.
comments: This contract was competitively sourced.This contract is a multi-year contract.For a contract with task authorizations, the realized amount of the contract is contingent on the number of task authorizations issued and may be less than the amount proactively disclosed, dependent on the operational requirements of the department.
